task.en: Please help me change the default language of script editor to JavaScript. After changing that, do not close the settings panel because I want to see where you did the setting.

grading_command: osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to tell process "Script Editor" to get value of pop up button "Default Language:" of window "General"' | grep -q "JavaScript" && echo "True" || echo "False"
